idCN: 流程控制/插针/显示全部插针
memo: 显示当前场景全部插针

idCN: 测试/找出血量最少单位
memo: 传入单位列表，返回hp最少单位
script: main:get $__param0 0set $tmpfor $i 1 $__param0.Countget $__param0  $iset $unitcallWith $unit._property GetHpPercentSNset $hp1callWith $tmp._property GetHpPercentSNset $hp2if $hp1 lt $hp2set $tmp $unitendifendForret $tmp

memo: 检测卡牌上是否有传入的buff。全都没有返回true
paramHelp: buff0buff1buff2buff3buff4buff5
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if		getp cardProperty		set $property		if			getp buffSystem				set $buffSystem			get $__param0			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param1			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param2			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param3			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param4			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param5			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif		endif	endifendifret $true

script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if		getp owner		set $owner		if			getp buffSystem			set $buffSystem			get $__param0			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			get $__param1			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			get $__param2			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			get $__param3			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			get $__param4			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			get $__param5			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif		endif	endifendifret $true

script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core teamData	set $team	if		getp sysUnit		set $sysUnit		if			getp buffSystem			set $buffSystem			get $__param0			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param1			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param2			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param3			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param4			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif				get $__param5			set $buffId			if				get $buffSystem				cgf GetBuffLevel $buffId				set $lv				if					ret $false				endif			endif			endif	endifendifret $true

script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	getp currentCard	if		getp cardProperty		set $cardProperty		getp isLeaderCard		if 			ret $false		endif		get $cardProperty		getp card		if			getp isLeaderCard			if				ret $true			endif		endif	endifendifret $false

idCN: 卡牌/功能节点/卡牌可使用/释放者未被禁锢
memo: 检测卡牌使用者上是否有传入的buff。全都没有返回true
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if		getp owner		set $owner		if			getp buffSystem			set $buffSystem			cgf GetSpecialLink "CardViewBanUse"            set $buffLink			if                get $buffLink count                set $buffCount                if $buffCount gt 0					ret $false                endif			endif		endif	endifendifret $true

idCN: 卡牌/功能节点/卡牌可使用/卡牌未被禁锢
memo: 检测卡牌上是否有传入的buff。全都没有返回true
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if		getp cardProperty		set $property		if			getp buffSystem			set $buffSystem			cgf GetSpecialLink "CardViewBanUse"            set $buffLink			if                get $buffLink count                set $buffCount                if $buffCount gt 0					ret $false                endif			endif		endif	endifendifret $true

main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif    get $core _currentAction	set $action           get $core currentCard	     set $c	    get $action card    set $curCard    get $core	setp currentCard $curCard     get $core currentCard	     set $cendifret $true

idCN: 卡牌/剔除无法选中目标
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp rtUnitListset $rtUnitListif	get $rtUnitList Count	set $count	for $i 1 $count 		sub $count $i		set $idx		get $rtUnitList $idx		set $curUnit		getp isCantBeHit		set $isCantBeHit		if 			callWith $rtUnitList Remove $curUnit		endif	endforendifret $true

memo: 玩家等级达到进入店铺的要求
script: local stationPlace = PlayerData:GetFactoryData($param0, "HomeStationPlaceFactory")return PlayerData:GetUserInfo().lv < stationPlace.levelOpen

idCN: LUA/拉面店/等级不足文本提示
script: local stationPlace = PlayerData:GetFactoryData($param0, "HomeStationPlaceFactory")CommonTips.OpenTips(string.format(GetText(stationPlace.lockedTip), stationPlace.levelOpen))

idCN: 卡牌/功能节点/卡牌可使用/卡牌未被禁用
memo: 检测卡牌上是否有传入的buff。全都没有返回true
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if        get $core _commonAdjustWeightExList        set $_commonAdjustWeightExList        getp Count        set $_commonWeightCount        for $i 0 $_commonWeightCount            get $_commonAdjustWeightExList $i            set $tUnit            getp condition             set $tCondition            getp ca id            set $condId            if $condId eq 96200022                get $tUnit                getp weight                set $condWeight                if $condWeight gt 0                    set $isLeaderOn $true                endif            elseif $condId eq 96200021                get $tUnit                getp weight                set $condWeight                if $condWeight gt 0                    set $isSpOn $true                endif            endif        endfor        get $card        getp cardProperty isLeaderCard        if             if $isLeaderOn                ret $true            endif        else            get $card            getp isLeaderCard            if                 if $isSpOn                    ret $true                endif            endif        endif        get $card		getp ca id		set $id		        get $core extraCardWeightDic        set $extraCardWeightDic        callWith $extraCardWeightDic ContainsKey $id        if            get $extraCardWeightDic $id            set $weight            if $weight lt 0                ret $false            endif        endif	endifendifret $true

idCN: 卡牌/功能节点/卡牌可使用/卡牌未被禁止拖拽
memo: 检测卡牌上是否有传入的buff。全都没有返回true
script: main:getc CBus Instancecgf GetManager "BattleControlManager"getp currentCoreset $coreif	get $core currentCard	set $card	if		getp cardProperty		set $property		if			getp buffSystem			set $buffSystem			cgf GetSpecialLink "CardViewBanDrag"            set $buffLink			if                get $buffLink count                set $buffCount                if $buffCount gt 0					ret $false                endif			endif		endif	endifendifret $true
